article:
My name is Alice. I _ two brothers. Their _ are Peter and Paul. Peter and Paul lik _ , and they eat chicken for lunch every day. But I like vegetables and fruit. Vegetables and fruit are good for my health. I eat _ every day. So I am healthy.
Peter and Paul also _ dessert . Their favorite dessert is ice-cream . But ice- cream is not good for their health. They can't _ ice-cream every day. My favorite food _ apples and tomatoes. I eat apples for _ every morning and tomatoes for dinner every _ .
